name: World Of Smiles
description:
Create combinations of 3 smiles in a row and play exciting puzzles in the world of smiles. Use super effects, fire balls, stones, ice, electricity and more to progress through the levels. Move around the map and try to complete all puzzle. Download and enjoy the best game in its genre!

Plunge yourself in a world full of adventure in the World of Smiles.

Join the official Facebook group! Secrets of the Games, the latest news, all about Raffles and Gifts.
https://www.facebook.com/World-of-Smiles-949058145175751/
